title: Understanding Bipolar Disorder
text: Bipolar disorder is a mental health condition that involves significant mood changes. It is important to recognize the key characteristics that define this disorder.

title: Key Features of Bipolar Disorder
text: Bipolar disorder is characterized by episodes of depression and mania or hypomania. These mood changes can be severe and impact daily functioning.

hintAnswer: recurrent illness that involves changes in mood and energy that may be severe and involves both depression and mania, or hypomania
title: Identifying Bipolar Disorder
text: Which of the following best describes bipolar disorder?
choices: feelings of sadness and/or loss of interest in activities once considered enjoyable
recurrent illness that involves changes in mood and energy that may be severe and involves both depression and mania, or hypomania
condition in which a person’s mood is abnormally elevated and is accompanied by high energy or activity
Mental health conditions characterized by persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, and difficulties in carrying out daily activities
